creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: squat vessel with tall foot; rounded body with outward-flaring rim; pair of handles with animal heads and tab-like bottom extensions; vertical incised ribs on body; top band has a pair of dragons each with two serpentine bodies; bottom band has stylized animals; green patina
markings: on bottom: five collectors\' and dealers\' stickers
title: Gui (ritual food vessel)
